title: GOP senator: Obama using ‘scare tactics’ to push Iran deal
text: Past: 1 day Trump calls off his bet with MSNBC... Lawrence O’Donnell retracted his challenge to Trump's financial disclosure... Planned Parenthood apologizes for... In a new video, president Cecile Richards says the group has done nothing... Boehner and McConnell must go They’ve become a roadblock to everything conservatives want to achieve. Trump: 'We should boycott Mexico' "It's a corrupt place," Trump said about the escape of drug lord "El Chapo... Republicans criticize Confederate... Congressmen say it was "inappropriate," governor blames Texas interlopers. Wanna bet? Trump makes wager after... Lawrence O’Donnell accused Trump of lying on his financial disclosure... Trump: Rick Perry 'should be... The real estate mogul fired back at the former Texas governor. Sanders makes play for black vote The candidate wants to shed the image that his support comes only from... Trump: McCain a 'dummy' Trump's comments are the latest shot fired in a growing war of words... Trump leads another 2016 poll Trump was followed by Scott Walker and Jeb Bush in the survey. Rep. Steve King: 'I'm as Hispanic... Castro is rumored to be a top running mate candidate for Hillary Clinton. Trump: McCain will lose his primary Trump also blames the Chattanooga shooting on gun-free zones. Reporter scolded by Obama: '... CBS's Major Garrett said he wanted to be provocative with question. Dems float compromise linking... The proposal would allow Republicans to pursue their spending agenda.
